languages.text: {n}Игнорируя устрашающие палаш и пистолет, несколько демонстративно висящие на поясе, вы обращаете внимание на множество тонких клинков с кривыми лезвиями, умело спрятанных в броне Вортена. Смертоносные игрушки в руках быстрого бойца — видимо, архмилитант Винтерскейла любит удивить врага неожиданной прытью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Игнорируя устрашающие палаш и пистолет, несколько демонстративно висящие на поясе, вы обращаете внимание на множество тонких клинков с кривыми лезвиями, умело спрятанных в броне Вортена. Смертоносные игрушки в руках быстрого бойца — видимо, архмилитант Винтерскейла любит удивить врага неожиданной прытью.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Игнорируя устрашающие палаш и пистолет, несколько демонстративно висящие на поясе, вы обращаете внимание на множество тонких клинков с кривыми лезвиями, умело спрятанных в броне Вортена. Смертоносные игрушки в руках быстрого бойца — видимо, архмилитант Винтерскейла любит удивить врага неожиданной прытью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which are hanging from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skillfully concealed within Worten's armor. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

{n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これ見よがしにベルトから吊されたブロードソードと拳銃という恐ろしげな見た目を無視すれば、縁が湾曲した多数の薄い刃をヴォルテンの鎧にうまく隠していると気づく。あんなおもちゃでも動きの速い戦士が扱えば厳しい相手になる。ウィンタースケールのアーク・ミリタントは予想を上回るスピードで相手を奇襲するのが好きなようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これ見よがしにベルトから吊されたブロードソードと拳銃という恐ろしげな見た目を無視すれば、縁が湾曲した多数の薄い刃をヴォルテンの鎧にうまく隠していると気づく。あんなおもちゃでも動きの速い戦士が扱えば厳しい相手になる。ウィンタースケールのアーク・ミリタントは予想を上回るスピードで相手を奇襲するのが好きなようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管他腰间挂着引人注目的阔剑和手枪，但你注意到沃尔腾的铠甲中巧妙地隐藏着许多把弯曲、细长的薄刃。如果使用者的身手足够敏捷，这些利刃将会成为致命的武器。看来，温特斯凯尔的首席战士擅长以出人意料的敏捷发起奇袭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管他腰间挂着引人注目的阔剑和手枪，但你注意到沃尔腾的铠甲中巧妙地隐藏着许多把弯曲、细长的薄刃。如果使用者的身手足够敏捷，这些利刃将会成为致命的武器。看来，温特斯凯尔的首席战士擅长以出人意料的敏捷发起奇袭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ignorando la imponente espada ancha y la pistola que cuelgan de su cinturón, notas una gran serie de hojas finas y curvas escondidas en la armadura de Worten. Estas armas son letales en manos de un combatiente veloz. Parece que al Archimilitante de Winterscale le gusta sorprender a sus enemigos con una velocidad inesperada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignorando la imponente espada ancha y la pistola que cuelgan de su cinturón, notas una gran serie de hojas finas y curvas escondidas en la armadura de Worten. Estas armas son letales en manos de un combatiente veloz. Parece que al Archimilitante de Winterscale le gusta sorprender a sus enemigos con una velocidad inesperada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En plus de sa longue épée et de son pistolet qui pendent à sa ceinture, vous remarquez un certain nombre de fines lames dissimulées dans l'armure de Worten, des armes particulièrement mortelles entre les mains d'un combattant rapide. Il semblerait que l'archimilitant de Winterscale aime surprendre ses adversaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En plus de sa longue épée et de son pistolet qui pendent à sa ceinture, vous remarquez un certain nombre de fines lames dissimulées dans l'armure de Worten, des armes particulièrement mortelles entre les mains d'un combattant rapide. Il semblerait que l'archimilitant de Winterscale aime surprendre ses adversaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neben dem furchterregend aussehenden Breitschwert und der Pistole, die demonstrativ an seinem Gürtel hängen, bemerkst du zahlreiche dünne, gekrümmte Klingen, die kunstvoll in Wortens Rüstung verborgen sind. In den Händen eines schnellen Kämpfers sind diese Spielzeuge tödlich – anscheinend überrascht Winterzunders Erzmilitant seinen Gegner gerne mit unerwarteter Geschwindigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben dem furchterregend aussehenden Breitschwert und der Pistole, die demonstrativ an seinem Gürtel hängen, bemerkst du zahlreiche dünne, gekrümmte Klingen, die kunstvoll in Wortens Rüstung verborgen sind. In den Händen eines schnellen Kämpfers sind diese Spielzeuge tödlich – anscheinend überrascht Winterzunders Erzmilitant seinen Gegner gerne mit unerwarteter Geschwindigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bütün gösterişiyle kemerinden sarkan korkunç görünümlü geniş kılıç ile tabancayı görmezden gelip zırhının içine ustaca gizlenmiş, kavisli kenarları olan çok sayıda ince bıçağı fark ediyorsun. Bu oyuncaklar, hızlı bir dövüşçünün elinde ölümcüldür. Görünüşe göre Winterscale'in Başmilitan'ı, rakibini beklenmedik bir hızla şaşırtmayı seviyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the fearsome-looking broadsword and pistol, which hang from his belt rather ostentatiously, you notice a great number of thin blades with curved edges skilfully concealed within Worten's armour. These toys are deadly in the hands of a quick fighter — it appears that Winterscale's Arch-Militant likes to surprise his opponent with unexpected speed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oldukça gösterişli bir biçimde kemerinden sarkan korkunç görünümlü geniş kılıç ile tabancayı görmezden gelip zırhının içine ustaca gizlenmiş kavisli kenarları olan çok sayıda ince bıçak fark ediyorsun. Bu oyuncaklar, hızlı bir dövüşçünün elinde ölümcüldür. Görünüşe göre Winterscale'in Başmilitanı, rakibini beklenmedik bir hızla şaşırtmayı seviyor.{/n}
